A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Spoiler free: Rian Johnson took a lot of risks\, most paid off but some didn’t. I think the biggest flaw with the film was that the pacing felt off. Characters and plot lines were shoved around into specific positions and occasionally this made the story feel disjointed. But I liked the film a lot primarily because it handled the most important storyline — Rey’s struggle with learning about the force — extremely well. That was the toughest part of the story to get right and I think Johnson did a fantastic job with it. Mark Hamill and Daisy Ridley put on incredible acting displays. Overall I enjoyed it!
